title: University Campus Informal Learning Space Design Project

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Spatial Design Concepts and Understanding of Learning Environments
context.additional_context: Informal language learning space design project at corporate university campuses utilizing smartphone-based collaboration tools.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze three or more social learning facilitation elements in informal spaces on campus.
Learners can propose space design strategies implementable in resource-constrained technological environments.
Learners can create prototype blueprints for informal learning spaces that support language acquisition.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
